FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SLACK_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by Slack

SLACK_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by Slack

OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE.description: Indicates that it's OK for Slack to return different OAuth scopes. Don't change this!
